metadata.description:
Letter to Maj. General Basilio Valdes from President Manuel L. Quezon ordering the former to depart Corregidor and accompany the President

Excerpt from "I Saw the Fall of the Philippines" by Colonel Carlos P. Romulo, p. 184
metadata.subject: Basilio Valdes; World War II; Corregidor; War Cabinet; official papers
metadata.title: Letter to Maj. General Basilio Valdes from President Manuel L. Quezon ordering the former to depart Corregidor and accompany the President
